title: E-Book Utilization Strategies in Distance Education: Interactive Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and foundational understanding of language education
context.additional_context: Process for pre-/in-service teachers to acquire interactive learning methods using e-books in language education

learning_goals: Learners can design lessons that enhance learner engagement by 30% or more using interactive e-book features (hyperlinks, quizzes, multimedia).
Learners can explain methods to effectively integrate language learning materials (pronunciation, vocabulary, grammar) and apply formative assessments via e-books.
Learners can design e-book-based activities (online discussions, collaborative annotations) in blended environments and develop teaching strategies linked to offline classes.

resources: Interactive E-book Platform with Embedded Features
E-book Authoring Tools (Canva, iBooks Author, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
